summary: This document is an email chain forwarding signed warrant materials related to the Epstein case, including a signed application/affidavit. It involves communication between an Assistant United States Attorney and court operations staff in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Ona Wang
persons.context: Identified as the sender of the signed application/affidavit related to Epstein, with the title USMJ USDC-SDNY.

events.title: Submission of Signed Epstein Warrant
events.description: Ona Wang sends the signed application/affidavit for a warrant related to Epstein via email.

events.title: Forwarding of Warrant Materials
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney forwards the signed warrant materials to court operations staff for arraignment.

keyFacts: Signed warrant materials related to Jeffrey Epstein were processed in October 2020.
The document involves an email chain between an Assistant U.S. Attorney and court operations staff in the SDNY.
United States Magistrate Judge Ona Wang is identified as the sender of the signed application/affidavit.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings related to Epstein after his death in 2019.
The correspondence is focused on the logistical handling of warrant materials for arraignment.
